word: Rekindle the Spirit of Evangelism of 1844. [THIS, ELLEN G. WHITE'S LAST MESSAGE TO THE GENERAL CONFERENCE IN SESSION IN 1913, WAS READ TO THE CONFERENCE BY THE PRESIDENT, A. G. DANIELLS, TUESDAY MORNING, MAY 27.]--Recently in the night season my mind was impressed by the Holy Spirit with the thought that if the Lord is coming as soon as we believe He is, we ought to be even more active than we have been in years past in getting the truth before the people.
